entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
